SEARCH
Package se.swedenconnect.security.credential.config.properties

Class PkiCredentialConfigurationProperties

java.lang.Object
se.swedenconnect.security.credential.config.properties.PkiCredentialConfigurationProperties
All Implemented Interfaces:
PkiCredentialConfiguration
Direct Known Subclasses:
PkiCredentialConfigurationProperties
public class PkiCredentialConfigurationProperties extends Object implements PkiCredentialConfiguration
Configuration properties for configuring a stand-alone PkiCredential.

Note: One, and exactly one, of bundle(), jks() or pem() must be supplied.

Author:
Martin Lindstr√∂m
